fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Peasants
Defense: Basic Auto-Vest against Evils

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player. The next day, it is announced to the town that the Marionette's dark presence can be felt. Two uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On the day after you use your ability, if the chosen player would be hanged, they are cleaned and you can deal an unstoppable attack to any player immediately.
- You may choose yourself with your ability. If you do so, if you are hanged, you instead live and can deal an unstoppable attack to any player. Voting is still done by plurality instead of majority.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang someone else in your place.
